titleStmt.title: Collyrium a sermon of destructive ignorance and saving knowledge, preached in Christ-Church, Dublin, August 4, 1672, and published at the importunity of divers, who thought it might tend to disabuse many well-meaning people / by Edw. Wetenhall.
titleStmt.author: Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Rooks, and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin University.
